Hi Steve,
Did you produce the problem from product packing TPTP 4.2.1 or from a vanilla TPTP 4.2.1?
WTP does not support WAS61, only WAS60. Do you see the problem with TPTP+WTP+WAS60 on your Linux box?

Hi, According to tester(Tracey Brown Burton, traceymb@us.ibm.com), the testcase works in WAS60 server profiling. WAS61 is not supported by WTP. As a result. I am returning this bug as INVALID. Please trace the bug with the downstream product supporting WAS61.

Correction: Tracey stated that the test was working on a downstream product version 60, not IBM WAS60. She is going to try WAS60 and verify the result.

If problem exist in WAS60 with TPTP, this bug will be reopened.

(In reply to comment #3)
